autoConnect.title: Should the specified port be connected to when VSCode activates

baudrate.title: The baudrate for the connection to use when connecting to the port

resetBeforeSend.title: Reset the device before before sending the new file

port.title: The COM port which the device will connect via

description: This file contains the various settings for connecting and setting up an Espruino device and running a program on it. Primarily this is used by the Espruino VS Code extension
title: Settings for an Espruino project run from VS Code
